code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MusicService=_ref=>{let{token,setTrackList}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{const fetchTracks=async()=>{try{const tracks=await axios.get('https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/tracks',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setTrackList(tracks.data.items.map(item=>item.track));}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching tracks:',error);}};if(token){fetchTracks();}},[token,setTrackList]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});};export default MusicService;
